name: Along the Way Skirt
description:
Along the Way Skirt...the strip effect technique goes around the skirt. Soft and light weight with an exposed zipper at back. Completely finished within, no raw seams or edges. Each medium garment has a medium label and care instruction sewn in. 

original price $78.00

Available in sizes [s], [m], [l]

name: Big Time Cardigan Dress
description:
Big Time Cardigan Dress...Comes with 4 huge safety pins and elastic in hem for a full appearance. V-neck allows layering of your fave basic tank. Pockets are functionable. Depending on preference-buttonholes and buttons can replace the safety pins. Completely finished within, no raw seams or edges. Each medium garment has a medium label and care instruction sewn in. 

original price $88.00

name: My Birthday Outfit Dress
description:
"My Birthday Outfit" Dress...is the most comfortable zip up dress ever! Low scoop neck to leave room for your fave basic tank. Small collar and shirring across shoulder. Pockets can be added in side seams. Exposed zipper extends around dress to back. Can be reproduced in a plethora of fabrics suitable for your birthday!! Completely finished within, no raw seams or edges. Each medium garment has a medium label and care instruction sewn in. 

original price $59.00

Available in sizes [s], [m], [l]
